repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Manuscript is broken in the left margin. Folio number and benediction is half broken due to damaged left margins. Some folio are cut in the left margin but text is not lost. The foliation is continued from the first part of the manuscript so the numbering begins with 184-271.

msItem.title: Bhaṭṭabhāskarabhāṣya 2nd kāṇḍa
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara
msItem.incipit: 184v 1 ataḥ paraṃ kāmyāḥ paśavo vidhīyante . kāmyaprāyāḥ naimittikāñca madhye vidhānāt . teṣāṃ na parvādiniyamo nAsti vaiśvadevakāṇḍaṃ ca vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabhe[te] (rest of the line is broken so approximately 12-13 syllables are lost.)
msItem.explicit: 271v 6 bhadre bhajanīye kalyāṇe saumanase saumanasya hetuke tatpradhānahetukasyābhimatasiddhīrūpe kalyāṇe ca syāmeti ye aviniyuktā mantrāḥ te liṃgena kṣīpyanurūpe karmmaṇi viniyoktavyāḥ 271v 7 iti ṣaṣṭhe dvādhaśo nuvākaḥ . ………..samāptaścāyaṃ prapāṭhakaḥ ………samāptaśca dvitīyakāṇḍaṃ ā?ṣaniṣpāvake śāke kuśikā?yajamānā bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśreṇa jñānaya 271v 8 juḥ prakīrtitāḥ . …….
msItem.colophon: hariḥ oṃ ………. śūbamastu …… karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ .. śrīmatyāgādhirājāya namaḥ .. kālayuktidi (2 illegible syllables.) mithaḍyaṃ (something is ṭritten but it is jumbled so illegible.)

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 2 blank folio and 87 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin. The foliation is continued from the first part of the manuscript so the numbering begins with 184-271.
supportDesc.condition: Manuscript broken in the left margin. Folio number and benediction is half broken due to damaged left margins. Some folio are cut in the left margin but text is not lost.

handNote.desc: Mostly writing is clean and nice.

additions.desc: Front cover note in roman. Bhaṭṭabhāskarabhāṣya 2nd kāṇḍa Granth 170 p 8 L

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vols 3-4 kāṇḍa 2 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit no. 9 Mysore Government Branch press 1896 .(Vol 1-10 available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to saperate words. Sqare bracket is used for syllable which is inferred.

TEI.text:
184v 1 śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ . ataḥ paraṃ kāmyāḥ paśavo vidhīyante . kāmyaprāyāḥ naimittikāñca madhye vidhānāt . teṣāṃ na parvādiniyamo nAsti vaiśvadevakāṇḍaṃ ca vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabhe[te] (rest of the line is broken so approximately 12-13 syllables are lost.)
271v 6 bhadre bhajanīye kalyāṇe saumanase saumanasya hetuke tatpradhānahetukasyābhimatasiddhīrūpe kalyāṇe ca syāmeti ye aviniyuktā mantrāḥ te liṃgena kṣīpyanurūpe karmmaṇi viniyoktavyāḥ 271v 7 iti ṣaṣṭhe dvādhaśo nuvākaḥ . ………..samāptaścāyaṃ prapāṭhakaḥ ………samāptaśca dvitīyakāṇḍaṃ ā?ṣaniṣpāvake śāke kuśikā?yajamānā bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśreṇa jñānaya 271v 8 juḥ prakīrtitāḥ . …….hariḥ oṃ ………. śūbamastu …… karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ .. śrīmatyāgādhirājāya namaḥ .. kālayuktidi (2 illegible syllables.) mithaḍyaṃ (something is ṭritten but it is jumbled so illegible.)
